dcterms:description: A dataset containing trajectories of mice navigating a 127-node labyrinth, demonstrating rapid learning, sudden insight, and efficient exploration.
dcterms:title: Mice navigating a 127-node labyrinth

dcterms:description: A real mice decision-making dataset from a dynamic two-armed bandit task, used to investigate neuronal correlates of behavioral flexibility.
dcterms:title: Real mice decision-making dataset from a dynamic two-armed bandit task
